H0.text: The majority of the land area of Africa lies in which hemisphere. Southern

H1.text: The majority of the land area of Africa lies in which hemisphere. Eastern

H2.text: The majority of the land area of Africa lies in which hemisphere. Western

H3.text: The majority of the land area of Africa lies in which hemisphere. Northern

A4.text: Africa straddles the equator and the prime meridian.
